name: 书之旅人 Story Walker
description:
The Story Walker tells the story of the new book wizard entering the book world to collect elves.



Please pay attention to the following items when playing this game:



Chinese only

If you are not good at Chinese, it will be hard to play this game



Walking simulator

Players, please walk slowly, be careful to faint 3D



Beware of falling asleep

This game may not have a good game experience. Please choose your free time to play



Mass air wall

Please don't try to fly out of the map



Please pay attention to the slow conversation

Please don't click too fast when skipping the conversation. The probability of blocking will occur

If you encounter a card, please uninstall the game immediately



Pass the customs with one life

This game does not have the function of saving progress



Homework payable

Thank you for downloading and playing
